tool_description: Converts caloric requirements into specific portion sizes using measuring cups, weights, and feeding guidelines for selected foods.

food_calories_per_cup.description: Caloric density of chosen food per cup

error_messages: Invalid target calories: Target calories must be positive number
Invalid food caloric density: Calories per cup must be positive
Invalid measurement preference: Use one of [cups, grams, ounces]
usage: Input target_calories and food_calories_per_cup for portion calculation. Optionally specify measurement_preference for desired units.
